nodes.text: Raxus sliders were one of the speciality sliders on the menu in Dex's Diner on the planet Coruscant. It was inspired by the planet Raxus Prime and the fact that almost anything could be found amongst the junk that covered much of the planet, to reflect this the slider contained whatever leftovers Dexter Jettster found in his kitchen. It cost 6.7 credits.
